where deliverer_id = #{delivererId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update deliverer_info set deliverer_name = #{delivererName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_phone = #{delivererPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_idcard = #{delivererIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_username = #{delivererUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_password = #{delivererPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_state = #{delivererState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverer_creditworthiness = #{delivererCreditworthiness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliverer_status = #{delivererStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliverer_id = #{delivererId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update deliverer_info set deliverer_state ='rest' where deliverer_id=#{id}
update deliverer_info set deliverer_state ='working' where deliverer_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from deliverer_info where deliverer_username=#{username} and deliverer_password=#{password}
